price: ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߜߎ ߓߘߊ߫ ߘߊ߲ߠߌ߲߫ ߝߟߐ ߟߐ߲߫ ߸ ߥߟߊߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߦߴߊߟߎ߫ ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߫ ( ߏ߬ ߡߊ߬ )
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ فَلَوۡلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu al-nashata al-ūlā falawlā tadhakkarūna
